title: 820-3115 LCD_IG_PWR_EN is missing
message:
Hello,
Would any one be so kind to help with this issue that i'm facing, please.
A logicboard 820-3115 has green light on the charger and it turns on but there is no video.
I measured U9000 and LCD_IG_PWR_EN on pin 1 is missing. pin 2 and 3 have 3,42.
pin 4 5 and 6 are 0.
(Sorry for my bad English)

title: 820-3115 LCD_IG_PWR_EN is missing
message:
Check first for USB activity; no reason to search video on a non-working board...

Post voltage for L7510/20.

title: 820-3115 LCD_IG_PWR_EN is missing
message:
Thanks for your replay
the voltage on L7510 is 0.84v and L7520 is 0.83 and L7550 is 0.34
and the usb muse turns on

title: 820-3115 LCD_IG_PWR_EN is missing
message:
So the board boots.
Check voltage on J9000, pins 4, 6, 7.

title: 820-3115 LCD_IG_PWR_EN is missing
message:
all of them 4, 6 and 7 have 3,39v
(cable is not connected)

title: 820-3115 LCD_IG_PWR_EN is missing
message:
You need to connect LCD when measure J9000.
Check if L9004/08/80 are all OK.

Next, check resistance to ground on all LVDS_IG_A_DATA_ lines.

title: 820-3115 LCD_IG_PWR_EN is missing
message:
The L9004, L9008, L9080 are all ok.
and the resistance to ground on pin 8,9,11,12,14, 15 and 17 are between 1.2 and 2 ohms

title: 820-3115 LCD_IG_PWR_EN is missing
message:
???
Did you measure diode mode on powered board???
Please, measure in correct way...

title: 820-3115 LCD_IG_PWR_EN is missing
message:
Dear sir,
I measured them again on powered board with connected cable,
all of these pins 8,9,11,12,14, 15 and 17 are 1.01 in diode mode

title: 820-3115 LCD_IG_PWR_EN is missing
message: and pp3v3_LCDVDD_SW on diode mode shows 0.071

title: 820-3115 LCD_IG_PWR_EN is missing
message: Never-ever measure diode mode on powered board!!!

title: 820-3115 LCD_IG_PWR_EN is missing
message:
Dear I did the measurement again.
pin 8,9,11,12,14,15,17 are 0.64 in diode mode

title: 820-3115 LCD_IG_PWR_EN is missing
message: Try known good LCD assembly (screen + video cable).

title: 820-3115 LCD_IG_PWR_EN is missing
message: with LCD assembly all the pins 8,9,11,12,14,15,17 are 0.42.

title: 820-3115 LCD_IG_PWR_EN is missing
message:
"Try known good LCD assembly (screen + video cable)."
Means check if get image and backlight...

title: 820-3115 LCD_IG_PWR_EN is missing
message:
PP3V3_S0_LCD_F  on pin 4 is 3.4
LVDS_DDC_CLK on pin 6 is 3.4
LVDS_DDC_DATA on pin 7 is 3,4
on backlight fuse i have 12,4
LCD_PWR_EN is missing

title: 820-3115 LCD_IG_PWR_EN is missing
message:
PP3V3_S0_LCD_F on pin 4 is 3.4
LVDS_DDC_CLK on pin 6 is 3.4
LVDS_DDC_DATA on pin 7 is 3,4
on backlight fuse i have 12,4
LCD_PWR_EN is missing

title: 820-3115 LCD_IG_PWR_EN is missing
message:
PP3V3_S0_LCD_F on pin 4 is 3.4
LVDS_DDC_CLK on pin 6 is 3.4
LVDS_DDC_DATA on pin 7 is 3,4
on backlight fuse i have 12,4
LCD_PWR_EN is missing

title: 820-3115 LCD_IG_PWR_EN is missing
message: Sorry accidentally post it 3 times

title: 820-3115 LCD_IG_PWR_EN is missing
message:
Did you measure with known good LCD connected?
Do you get image and only missing backlight?

title: 820-3115 LCD_IG_PWR_EN is missing
message:
yes I measured with known good LCD connected.
and on U9000 pin one LCD_PWR_EN is missing but pin 2 and 3 are ok.
and on the LCD connector pin 2 and 3 PP3V3_LCDVDD_SW_F is missing
pin 6 LVDS_DDC_CLK is 3.4
pin 7 LVDS_DDC_DATA is 3,4

title: 820-3115 LCD_IG_PWR_EN is missing
message:
Seems that LCD is not detected.
Do you surelly have USB activity?

title: 820-3115 LCD_IG_PWR_EN is missing
message:
Yes Sir when i plug a usb mouse the red light turns on ( I tried with different mouses ). And also on L7510 and L7520 I get 0.88v but on L7550 I gent 0.35v.
(The L7550 is PPVCORE_S0_AXG_R)

title: 820-3115 LCD_IG_PWR_EN is missing
message: I've replace the U7000 with a new one( not from a downer board)  because be for L7520 and L7510 had 0v.

title: 820-3115 LCD_IG_PWR_EN is missing
message:
What relation you've seen between U7000 and L7510/20???

"L7510 and L7520 I get 0.88v but on L7550 I gent 0.35v
--------------
for L7520 and L7510 had 0v"
What this mean???

title: 820-3115 LCD_IG_PWR_EN is missing
message: be for i didn't have cpuvcore because of the U7400 I decided to replace U7400 and Q7510, Q7520 and Q7550 after replacing them I get 0.8 on L7510,20 and 0.3 on L7550

title: 820-3115 LCD_IG_PWR_EN is missing
message:
CPU_VCC_VALSENS_N and CPU_AXG_VALSENS_N are missing but

PPVCORE_S0_CPU is ok and CPU_VALSENS_P is also ok
